definition: to call by a distinctive title, epithet, or nickname
examples: Critics have dubbed him the new king of rock 'n' roll.

definition: to trim or remove the comb (see comb entry 1 sense 2a) and wattles of
to hit (a ball or shot) poorly
one who is inept or clumsy
to add (sound effects or new dialogue) to a film or to a radio or television production
to provide (a motion-picture film) with a new soundtrack and especially dialogue in a different language
examples: The film was dubbed in French and Spanish.

definition: to make a new recording of (sound or videotape already recorded), to mix (recorded sound or videotape from different sources) into a single recording
Jamaican music in which audio effects and spoken or chanted words are imposed on an instrumental reggae background
